description: Sean Garner, 30, of Liverpool, is charged with being the owner of a dangerously out of control dog.
title: Liverpool man charged over XL bully attack in Warrington
title_page: Liverpool man charged over XL bully attack in Warrington - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been charged after an 84-year-old man was attacked by an XL bully dog and left critically injured.
The victim was "savagely attacked" after being chased into a garden in Bardsley Avenue in Warrington, on Monday evening, Cheshire Police said.
Sean Garner, 30, from Liverpool, has been charged with being the owner of a dangerously out of control dog, causing serious injury and possession of a fighting dog.
He has been remanded in custody and is due to appear at Chester Magistrates' Court.
